pages.title: The Madness
pages.text: Good God...what the actual fuck just happened...? That was hellish...

pages.title: What Happens
pages.text: Well, apparently what happens is you're met with a swarm of nightmares. Another side effect is that they're corrupted. And it corrupts ALL hostile mobs that have been loaded into the world up until this point

pages.title: Corruption
pages.text: When a mob is corrupted, its stats take a HUGE boost, stronger, faster, and their loot is also messed up
